reviews.review:
Fun game if you're playing with friends unless you're somewhat a loner like me, but some random people are fun to play with. If you're okay with salty and toxic games then why not try this game out. Matchmaking takes awhile and sometimes isn't fair for others but it's all skills and perks on the side.

Just know that if others are salty or toxic towards you and you report them, the devs aren't gonna do much about it unless they were literally hacking and you have proof. Pretty much 98% of your reports aren't gonna do anything. I usually just leave right after the match ends to avoid toxic language.

Overall fun game.

El juego es bueno, sobretodo si lo juegas con amigos pero se hacen insufribles la cantidad anormal de bugs y errores que hay; desde errores con el easy anti cheat hasta borrarlo de tu biblioteca sin razón.

Mientras no optimicen bien el juego y todos sus detalles NO LO RECOMIENDO.
I really enjoy playing the game solo and with friends. Overall a great game with a few bugs but it is very very fun.
apareció un bug, de comprar el juego aunque ya lo tenia comprado,
Apparently if you get close to playing this game for 450 hours,  it decides to leave your account and make you buy it all over again.
Buen juego para jugarlo con amigos

I used to be excited to open this game.  I have a lot of time invested in it.  After this last patch I have decided to remove it from my library and I will likely never touch it again.  A game that used to bring me so much excitement now brings me nothing but misery.  Take my advice, save your money and time.  Find something else to play.
пупая драчильня для тех кто в дедстве ненайгрался в доганялки
me gusta los graficos y los sonidos de este juego esta buenisimo y si lo recomiendo
这次画质更新 很不错啊
为啥我买了杀机，他却显示我要购买，我都玩了42个小时了都..

So far this game has brought me nothing but enjoyment! Take this time we have to play this game it's so much fun!

Me encanta el juego, todo el contenido, todo :D
lo recomiendo totalmente
